foreignData.name: Wulfgar aus dem Eiswindtal
foreignData.text:
Tumult
Falls das Angreifen einer Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, eine ausgelöste Fähigkeit einer bleibenden Karte, die du kontrollierst, auslöst, wird die Fähigkeit ein weiteres Mal ausgelöst.

foreignData.name: Wulfgar del Valle del Viento Helado
foreignData.text:
Reyerta.
Si el ataque de una criatura que controlas hace que se dispare una habilidad disparada de un permanente que controlas, esa habilidad se dispara una vez más.

foreignData.name: Wulfgar du Valbise
foreignData.text:
Mêlée
Si une créature attaquante que vous contrôlez devait provoquer le déclenchement d'une capacité déclenchée d'un permanent que vous contrôlez, cette capacité se déclenche une fois de plus.

foreignData.name: Wulfgar della Valle del Vento Gelido
foreignData.text:
Mischia
Se una creatura che controlli e che viene dichiarata attaccante sta per far innescare un'abilità innescata di un permanente che controlli, quell'abilità si innesca una volta in più.

foreignData.name: アイスウィンド・デイルのウルフガル
foreignData.text:
会戦
あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーの攻撃によりあなたがコントロールしているパーマネントの誘発型能力１つが誘発するなら、その能力は追加でもう１回誘発する。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・バーバリアン

name: Wulfgar of Icewind Dale
originalText:
Melee
If a creature you control attacking would cause a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

rulings.text: Wulfgar of Icewind Dale's last ability affects only triggered abilities with conditions that are directly related to attacking, such as “whenever this creature attacks” or “whenever you attack with one or more creatures.” It does not affect triggered abilities with other trigger conditions, such as “whenever this creature becomes tapped.”
Wulfgar's last ability will cause its melee ability to trigger an additional time.

text:
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)
If a creature you control attacking would cause a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
